notes.title: Funding
notes.p: The study was sponsored by AHRI through the Biomedical Science Partnership Program (BSPP), funded by the Swedish International Development Cooperation Agency (Sida). The graduate studies program of the Addis Ababa University has covered some costs incurred during the field work. This work was also funded by Carolina LePrince and the “Kalenderflickorna” through crowd funding. Open Access funding provided by Lund University.
